If you ever find yourself in a position where you somehow lose the items from the starter chests and unable to continue, you can open the quest gui and click a button marked emergency. Clicking this will open a screen for 5 minutes and without closing it, will allow you to get a new set of initial items to get you going again.

h1: I lost my quest reward items

If you somehow manage to lose your reward items from one of the quest objectives, you can repeat the quest and receive the items for a second time. Be warned however that this will only work once.
